game.name: Midnight's Blessing 2
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A mysterious force targets Sidni, and she must flee to keep her home and friends safe! Sidni finds herself in a strange land that holds the keys to her past. On her adventure, she meets new friends and discovers a bizarre army, which is amassing to sweep the world, with herself as its primary target
game.shortDescriptionEn: A mysterious force targets Sidni, and she must flee to keep her home and friends safe! Sidni finds herself in a strange land that holds the keys to her past. On her adventure, she meets new friends and discovers a bizarre army, which is amassing to sweep the world, with herself as its primary target
